tree.name: John Tonje
tree.tradeDescription: Acquired from Utah in Chris Boucher deal. Boucher + cash + 2027 2nd to Jazz for Tonje (two-way) and trade exception
tree.note: 2025 2nd round pick (53rd overall) by Utah from Wisconsin
